20110110180729.000|20110110180733.000|CC1|YOUNG ADULTS, YOU KNOW, 18, 19, 
20110110180733.000|20110110180734.000|CC1|20-YEAR-OLD WHO JOINED THIS     
20110110180734.000|20110110180735.000|CC1|CHURCH IN SAN FRANCISCO AND THEN
20110110180735.000|20110110180739.000|CC1|HAD LEFT TO GO TO JONESTOWN.    
20110110180739.000|20110110180741.000|CC1|AND THERE WAS AN ENCAMPMENT OF  
20110110180741.000|20110110180742.000|CC1|900 PEOPLE.                     
20110110180742.000|20110110180743.000|CC1|HE WANTED TO GO AND FIRSTHAND   
20110110180743.000|20110110180744.000|CC1|FIND OUT IF THEY WERE BEING HELD

20110110180746.000|20110110180749.000|CC1|LEAVE WITH US AND DID LEAVE WITH

20110110180749.000|20110110180753.000|CC1|AND THEN AT THAT AIRSTRIP,      
20110110180753.000|20110110180755.000|CC1|UNBEKNOWNst TO US, THERE WAS A  
20110110180755.000|20110110180756.000|CC1|ELECTRICITY FOLLOWING BEHIND US 
20110110180756.000|20110110180757.000|CC1|SOME DISTANCE AND THEY CAME AND 
20110110180757.000|20110110180759.000|CC1|SHOT US AT POINT BLANK RANGE.   
20110110180759.000|20110110180802.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN RYAN WAS SHOT OVER  
20110110180802.000|20110110180804.000|CC1|40 TIMES.                       
20110110180804.000|20110110180806.000|CC1|>> CONGRESSWOMAN, ONE OTHER     
20110110180806.000|20110110180806.000|CC1|POINT.                          
20110110180806.000|20110110180808.000|CC1|THIS REALLY, TO MANY PEOPLE, IS 
20110110180808.000|20110110180811.000|CC1|AN ATTACK ON THE ESSENCE OF WE  
20110110180811.000|20110110180813.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE, OF THE

20110110180814.000|20110110180815.000|CC1|OUR DEMOCRACY.
